dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:30,000,000. Relief shown pictorially. From His Atlas maior, 1662-1665. Text on verso. Examples of different people's costumes in margins. Insets (all pictorial): Candy -- Calecuth -- Goa -- Damasco -- Ierusalem -- Ormus -- Bantam -- Aden -- Macao.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
